uh...!\""},{"lineNumber":167458,"originalJapaneseLine":"ニミッツがカーッと耳まで赤く染める。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nimitz’s ears flushed bright red."},{"lineNumber":167459,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも……あの、先生……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... um, Sensei..."},{"lineNumber":167460,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わたし、どう、したら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"What should I do...?\""},{"lineNumber":167461,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう、ね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then...\""},{"lineNumber":167462,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは貴方が決めなさい。","translatedEnglishLine":"You must decide that for yourself."},{"lineNumber":167463,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ニミッツ自身で答えを出さなければいけないわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Nimitz, you have to come to your own answer.\""},{"lineNumber":167464,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あう……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Au...!\""},{"lineNumber":167465,"originalJapaneseLine":"あえて、突き放すようにメルフェイスは言った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Merufeisu deliberately spoke as if distancing herself."},{"lineNumber":167466,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ほほう……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Oh ho...)"},{"lineNumber":167467,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……大丈夫。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It’s alright."},{"lineNumber":167468,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それで何か失敗しても、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if you fail at something,"},{"lineNumber":167469,"originalJapaneseLine":"　先生は貴方の味方だから」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sensei will be on your side.\""},{"lineNumber":167470,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yeah...\""},{"lineNumber":167471,"originalJapaneseLine":"一度大きく頷き、","translatedEnglishLine":"She nodded firmly once,"},{"lineNumber":167472,"originalJapaneseLine":"ニミッツはランスに向き直る。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Nimitz turned to face Rance."},{"lineNumber":167473,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランスさんに、ついて、いき、ます……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I’ll follow you, Rance-san...\""},{"lineNumber":167474,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yo...\""},{"lineNumber":167475,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よろしくおねがいします！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please take care of me!\""},{"lineNumber":167476,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、これから沢山よろしくしてやろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, I’ll make sure to take good care of you from now on.\""},{"lineNumber":167477,"originalJapaneseLine":"「特に夜の方でな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Especially at night."},{"lineNumber":167478,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぐふふふ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"　Gufufufu...\""},{"lineNumber":167479,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah...\""},{"lineNumber":167480,"originalJapaneseLine":"「が、がんばるの、は……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I’ll do my best..."},{"lineNumber":167481,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その、戦闘、とかの、で……」","translatedEnglishLine":"In, um, battle and things like that...\""},{"lineNumber":167482,"originalJapaneseLine":"（先生としては……","translatedEnglishLine":"(As Sensei..."},{"lineNumber":167483,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス総統に好意を抱くのは……","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m worried that she’s developed feelings for Supreme Leader Rance..."},{"lineNumber":167484,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その……すごく心配だけれど……）","translatedEnglishLine":"That is... really concerning...)"},{"lineNumber":167485,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大丈夫、ニミッツ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are you okay, Nimitz?"},{"lineNumber":167486,"originalJapaneseLine":"　辛くなったら、先生に教えてね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"If it gets tough, please tell Sensei...\""},{"lineNumber":167487,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":167488,"originalJapaneseLine":"メルフェイスがニミッツの両肩に触れると、","translatedEnglishLine":"When Merufeisu touched Nimitz’s shoulders,"},{"lineNumber":167489,"originalJapaneseLine":"ニミッツはかすかに安心したように微笑んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nimitz gave a faint, relieved smile."},{"lineNumber":167490,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は総崩れとなった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army was completely routed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーおー、泡を食って逃げだし始めたな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh ho, they’ve started to panic and flee."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーっはっはっはっはっは！
誰が見逃してやるものか！」
リーザスの領地を取り戻すぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll take back the territory of Lizas!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおおおおおおおおお！！！！」
追撃しないっつったじゃねぇかよーーー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You said you wouldn’t pursue, didn’t you!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 浮き足だった魔軍に痛烈な一撃を食らわせ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: dealt a fierce blow to the demoralized demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスは領地を大きく取り戻した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Lizas greatly regained its territory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうも上手くハマると痛快だな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s exhilarating when things go so perfectly!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、魔人もどうにかなったし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, the demon lord is taken care of,
and the demon army has been driven off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ俺様は戻るとするか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I suppose it’s about time I head back."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ニミッツ、お前ももう俺様の女だ。
俺のことが好きなら近くにいない道理はなかろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you like me, there’s no reason for you to stay away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニミッツがカーッと耳まで赤く染める。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You must decide that for yourself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニミッツ自身で答えを出さなければいけないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nimitz, you have to come to your own answer."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あえて、突き放すようにメルフェイスは言った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Merufeisu deliberately spoke as if distancing herself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それで何か失敗しても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if you fail at something,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先生は貴方の味方だから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sensei will be on your side."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニミッツはランスに向き直る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Nimitz turned to face Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランスさんに、ついて、いき、ます……」
「うむ、これから沢山よろしくしてやろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, I’ll make sure to take good care of you from now on."
In, um, battle and things like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス総統に好意を抱くのは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m worried that she’s developed feelings for Supreme Leader Rance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その……すごく心配だけれど……）
辛くなったら、先生に教えてね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it gets tough, please tell Sensei..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メルフェイスがニミッツの両肩に触れると、
ニミッツはかすかに安心したように微笑んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nimitz gave a faint, relieved smile.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおおおおおおおおお！！！！」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうも上手くハマると痛快だな！」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そろそろ俺様は戻るとするか」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ニミッツ、お前ももう俺様の女だ。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニミッツがカーッと耳まで赤く染める。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニミッツ自身で答えを出さなければいけないわ」
